definition: A large commercial establishment that typically houses multiple retail stores, restaurants, and other businesses, providing a wide range of products and services to the public. It is commonly used to refer to a place where people go for shopping, leisure activities, and entertainment.

examples.english: The shopping center has many stores.
I am going to the shopping center today.
The shopping center is very big.

examples.german: Im Einkaufszentrum gibt es auch ein Kino.
examples.english: There is also a cinema in the shopping center.

examples.german: Das Einkaufszentrum hat einen großen Parkplatz.
examples.english: The shopping center has a large parking lot.
